description:
In the newly discovered Atmos version of Zeit, you hear the guitars much better, and we can clearly hear that it's not what it was before.

Snippet: https://mega.nz/file/a6p1hIBJ#12WjoQOyqFrsSLfoy_rT4_dUYYihGOny-VEEqgUS_3Y

Enjoy!
title: Zeit

description: Hi Rostislav, you completely ruined it. Abyss Watcher had the BPM right, had the guitars right. Only thing you did was add drums and choir since bass was already there. Feel free to add drums to this but don't change the BPM or anything else.
title: Zeit
Zeit

reports.summary: You basically got almost everything wrong fam. The BPM is 123. And the guitar tabs are wrong. Paul and RZK are playing different things in the fast picking part. + I don't know if you did this for yourself but the end is also wrong, it doesn't have a long 0, it just has 5's. Please fix the tab.
